Edges-Weird -- Male Human Medieval Legendary Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Liquid Courage: Drinking alcohol gives +1 Vigor step, ignore 1 wound penalty for 1 hr
Skills (25 Points):
Climbing: (str) d6 Knowledge (Arcana): (sma) d8 Streetwise: (sma) d8-3
Fighting: (agi) d8 Notice: (sma) d12 Survival: (sma) d8
Healing: (sma) d6+2 Psionics: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Charisma: -3 Persuasion/-3 Streetwise
Habit: -1 Charisma
Healer: +2 Healing
Ugly: -2 Charisma
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (7 points): Beast Bond; Beast Master; Danger Sense; Healer; Liquid Courage; Luck; Scavenger Hindrances: Enemy; Habit; Quirk; Ugly Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Beast Bond: May spend Bennies on companion animals
Beast Master: Has animal companion; other animals will not attack first
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Habit: Has irritating but harmless compulsion
Luck: +1 Benny each session
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 6 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Axe (d8+d6); Great Axe (d8+d8 AP 1); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Great Axe Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d8
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Danger Sense: May test Notice-2 before surprise attack
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Scavenger: May recover equipment 1/encounter
